abandonallhope.domain

Class MovingObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • abandonallhope.domain.MovingObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bullet, Survivor, Zombie

    public abstract class MovingObject
extends Object
    Moving object is a superclass for moving objects and contains methods to move objects around.
    Author:
    kipsu
